thread.title: My father has not got his due yet: Siddhant Bhosle
thread.title_full: My father has not got his due yet: Siddhant Bhosle - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: My father has not got his due yet: Siddhant Bhosle
text:
Son of famous singer Sudesh Bhosle, Siddhant seems to have found his feet in the Marathi film industry by lending his voice to songs from movies 'Biker's Adda' and 'Funkar', but he feels that his father has not got his due in the industry yet.
Voicing his opinion, the 21-year-old said, "People in the film industry tend to categorise or stereotype you at their convenience. So, once my father started mimicking the actors, the film fraternity failed to recognise his original voice and singing capabilities, which lie way beyond this typecasting."
READ: Sudesh sings for 'Vatsalya'
He went on to add that it is his father's versatility that has taught him the nitty-gritty of singing. "My father is an amazing stage performer. So, while growing up, I learnt the nuances of singing and performing in his company. Plus, I also developed other musical skills in terms of writing, composing and playing instruments which has helped me become a playback singer and a live performer," said the singer, who will soon be performing along with his father in a live show dedicated to Amitabh Bachchan , on the eve of his birthday, which falls on October 11.
